name: $proposed
desc: Some or all of the participant(s) have not finalized their acceptance of the appointment request.

name: $pending
desc: All participant(s) have been considered and the appointment is confirmed to go ahead at the date/times specified.

name: $booked
desc: The patient/patients has/have arrived and is/are waiting to be seen.

name: $arrived
desc: The planning stages of the appointment are now complete, the encounter resource will exist and will track further status changes. Note that an encounter may exist before the appointment status is fulfilled for many reasons.

name: $cancelled
desc: Some or all of the participant(s) have not/did not appear for the appointment (usually the patient).

name: $noshow
desc: This instance should not have been part of this patient's medical record.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: When checked in, all pre-encounter administrative work is complete, and the encounter may begin. (where multiple patients are involved, they are all present).

name: $checked-in
desc:
The appointment has been placed on a waitlist, to be scheduled/confirmed in the future when a slot/service is available.
A specific time might or might not be pre-allocated.
